patterns.hint: Check astro.config.mjs for syntax errors or incompatible integration versions
MDX syntax error. Check for unclosed JSX tags, unescaped special characters, or invalid frontmatter
Missing dependency. Run: npm install (or check the import path for typos)
Performance budget violated (< 80). Check image sizes, unused JS, and render-blocking resources
Content file not found. Verify the file exists in content/ and the slug matches the filename
Incomplete frontmatter. All pages need title + description + og:image. Blog posts also need date + tags. See PROJECT.md #Content Rules.
Client-side JS detected. No client-side JS unless absolutely necessary (progressive enhancement). See PROJECT.md #Architecture Rules.
Image missing alt text. All images must have descriptive alt text. See PROJECT.md #Content Rules.
